description:
syscall: document that documentation is platform specific

Fixes issue 4051

messages.text:
LGTM

I will wait a day or two before submitting.

https://codereview.appspot.com/6943063/diff/5001/src/pkg/syscall/syscall.go
File src/pkg/syscall/syscall.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6943063/diff/5001/src/pkg/syscall/syscall.go#newcode7
src/pkg/syscall/syscall.go:7: // godoc will only display the syscall documentation for the system on
this is actually incorrect.
you can view docs for other OS/arch by explicitly setting $GOARCH and
$GOOS. I suggest we add this as it is very useful to be able to see
docs for other platforms without first install a cross compilation
version of Go.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

PTAL

On 2012/12/15 18:02:46, minux wrote:
> https://codereview.appspot.com/6943063/diff/5001/src/pkg/syscall/syscall.go
> File src/pkg/syscall/syscall.go (right):
> 
> https://codereview.appspot.com/6943063/diff/5001/src/pkg/syscall/syscall.go#newcode7
> src/pkg/syscall/syscall.go:7: // godoc will only display the syscall
> documentation for the system on
> this is actually incorrect.
> you can view docs for other OS/arch by explicitly setting $GOARCH and
> $GOOS. I suggest we add this as it is very useful to be able to see
> docs for other platforms without first install a cross compilation
> version of Go.

Done.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0eb63dc25fd6 ***

syscall: document that documentation is platform specific

Fixes issue 4051

R=golang-dev, minux.ma, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/6943063

Committer: Shenghou Ma <minux.ma@gmail.com>

subject: code review 6943063: syscall: document that documentation is platform specific
